subject: Re: International Conference Invitation - Bangkok, Thailand
body:

Dear Professor/Researcher, Joint International Conference will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in Information Technology, Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical, Mechanical, Civil, Structural and Environmental Engineering, Human Science, Economics and Social Study. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field Last Date For Early Bird Paper Submission Round: 28 Oct, 2013 Conference Date(s): January 04-05, 2014 Conference City : Bangkok, Thailand Joint International Conference consists of the following tracks: Track 1: Advances in Computing and Information Technology - ACIT 2014 Website: www.acit.theired.org [1] Track 2: Advances in Electronics and Electrical Technology - AEET 2014 Website: www.aeet.theired.org Track 3: Advances in Environmental and Bio - Technology - AEBT 2014 Website: www.aebt.theired.org Track 4: Advances in Civil, Structural and Mechanical Engineering - ACSME 2014 website: www.acsme.theired.org Track 5: Advances in Human Science, Economics and Social Study - AHES 2014 website: www.ahes.theired.org[2] Joint Conference is being organized by The IRED (Institute of Research Engineers and Doctors), will be held during January 04-05, 2014 at Bangkok, Thailand. All the registered papers in the various tracks will proudly be published by IRED-CPS and stored in the SEEK digital Library. Each Paper will be assigned DOI (Digital Object Identifier) from CROSSREF. The Procc. will be submitted to ISI Thomson for Review and Indexing Please take the time to explore the website for more details, check on important dates, and keep yourself up to date on recent changes.[3] Registered Papers (IRED Extended paper guidelines applicable) will be published in the various issues of International journals Prospective authors are invited to submit full (original) research papers; which are NOT submitted or published or under consideration anywhere in other conferences or journals; in electronic (PDF only) format via email Other IRED conferences can be found at http://theired.org/conference_event.html We Request you to forward this email to your colleagues/Researchers/students in order to promote the conference Thanks Much IRED References: 1. http://www.ftcc.theired.org/ 2. http://www.eshb.theired.org/ 3. http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/l?u=20998A3&e=27DE9A&c=2E5C9&t=1&l=23A8D55&email=roVb%2B%2BWaTLhhsER1tbQoeJMtdysbAGpE This message was sent to foaad@calpoly.edu by newsletter@theired.org You can modify/update your subscription via the link below Unsubscribe from all mailings http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/su?e=3B3E70&c=40CE7&l=7C91A4B&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=4C4A98B5 Manage Subscription http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/s?e=3B3E70&c=40CE7&l=7C91A4B&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=4C4A98B5 Forward Email http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/f?e=3B3E70&c=40CE7&l=7C91A4B&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=4C4A98B5 Report Abuse http://www.benchmarkemail.com/Abuse?e=3B3E70&c=40CE7&l=7C91A4B&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=4C4A98B5 18 Lesley, Dr. Hampton Road, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
Having trouble viewing this email? click here

Aplogize for Multiple Copies of this email!

Dear Professor/Researcher,

Joint International Conference will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in Information Technology, Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical, Mechanical, Civil, Structural and Environmental Engineering, Human Science, Economics and Social Study. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field.

Last Date For Early Bird Paper Submission Round: 28 Oct, 2013

Conference Date(s): January 04-05, 2014

Conference City : Bangkok, Thailand

Joint International Conference consists of the following tracks:

Track 1: Advances in Computing and Information Technology - ACIT 2014

Website: www.acit.theired.org

 Track 2: Advances in Electronics and Electrical Technology - AEET 2014

Website: www.aeet.theired.org

 Track 3: Advances in Environmental and Bio - Technology - AEBT 2014

Website: www.aebt.theired.org


Track 4: Advances in Civil, Structural and Mechanical Engineering - ACSME  2014

website: www.acsme.theired.org


Track 5: Advances in Human Science, Economics and Social Study - AHES 2014

website: www.ahes.theired.org

Joint Conference is being organized by The IRED (Institute of Research Engineers and Doctors), will be held during January 04-05, 2014 at Bangkok, Thailand. All the registered papers in the various tracks will proudly be published by IRED-CPS and stored in the SEEK digital Library. Each Paper will be assigned DOI (Digital Object Identifier) from CROSSREF. The Procc. will be submitted to ISI Thomson for Review and Indexing.

Please take the time to explore the website for more details, check on important dates, and keep yourself up to date on recent changes.

Registered Papers (IRED Extended paper guidelines applicable) will be published in the various issues of International journals.

Prospective authors are invited to submit full (original) research papers; which are NOT submitted or published or under consideration anywhere in other conferences or journals; in electronic (PDF only) format via email.

Other IRED conferences can be found at http://theired.org/conference_event.html

We Request you to forward this email to your colleagues/Researchers/students in order to promote the conference.

Thanks Much
IRED

This message was sent to foaad@calpoly.edu by newsletter@theired.org
